item.title: What the Helm!?
item.description: Or, “things I with I knew about Helm before using it as the continuous delivery solution for my Kubernetes clusters!" I’ve been running Helm as a Continuous Delivery tool for over one year. At QuintoAndar we’ve used it to perform over 300 releases daily - I’m certain there are far larger use cases out there, but that is probably large-is enough to get to see the good, the bad and the ugly side of most tools.
